episodes.title: Ryan Proctor: Life in a Cult – Survival, Struggles, and Self-Discovery
episodes.description:
In this captivating episode, Ryan Proctor opens up about his extraordinary journey of growing up in a Mennonite cult and the challenges of breaking free. From a childhood defined by strict religious control to navigating family dynamics and personal identity, Ryan shares his story with honesty and depth. Discover how he found resilience through struggles, questioned his beliefs, and ultimately reclaimed his freedom. This is a powerful conversation about survival, self-discovery, and the courage to rewrite your story.
